comments:
While trying to open any file from a project, the window which should display 
the file shows its name (i.e.: ClassName.java) but dont open it.
I have tried reinstalling it and could not get it to work. The old projects 
also do not work anylonger.

It does not matter if i try to create a new project, a new class or simple txt 
file.

Log file follows

Thanks in advance,

Guilherme Silveira
